x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: mobile_properties

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_c483720e1be730507798a9b7624bcb2c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description>Mobile Properties Check</description><name>mobile_properties</name><order>100</order><probe_type display_value="Mobile SSO">e9dc377c1b681510ae5b21b5ec4bcb49</probe_type><remediation/><script><![CDATA[gs.info('************* System Properties for Mobile SSO ****************');
var daig = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
daig.printSystemProperties('x_nuvo_mobile.api_version,x_nuvo_mobile.authenticate.multisso.enabled,glide.authentication.external.disable_local_login,glide.authenticate.failed_requirement_redirect,glide.authenticate.multisso.enabled,glide.authenticate.sso.redirect.idp,x_nuvo_mobile.authentication.external.disable_local_login,glide.attachment.extensions,x_nuvo_mobile.schedule_event_for_future,x_nuvo_mobile.progress_worker_maximum');

//glide.attachment.extensions  if not blank json will need to added as a valid extension
//x_nuvo_mobile.schedule_event_for_future schedules x amount of seconds into the future if progress worker has been maxed
//x_nuvo_mobile.progress_worker_maximum max number of progress workers that can be run at once]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anthony.Santos@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-02 17:24:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c483720e1be730507798a9b7624bcb2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>mobile_properties</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_c483720e1be730507798a9b7624bcb2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 14:48:23</sys_updated_on></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
